page.title: 19SUPERNATURAL
page.content: {Haunted House} One of the oldest houses in the area has a history dating back to the first Domesday Book.We visited the present owners who told us of their "ghostly" sounds.Long ago a famous family were desperate to have children who lived there. A visting child recently was playing in one of the bedrooms when the childs mother checked on the child who was bouncing on the bed.She returned to the livin room to ask "who was that woman with the dark brown curly hair playing with the child?"Everyone was surprised because it was only the child upstairs.A number of visitors have seen and felt a friendly presence in one of the bedrooms, people think the connection between the ghost and house relates to children.
